languages.text: "Прошу, скажите мне, если вдруг... если с вами вновь случится подобное. И я помогу, заглушу вашу боль! Хоть я и не до конца понимаю, как именно мои силы передались вам, знаю одно — мне невыносимо видеть ваши страдания. А сейчас... отдыхайте".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу, скажите мне, если вдруг... если с вами вновь случится подобное. И я помогу, заглушу вашу боль! Хотья я и не до конца понимаю, как именно мои силы передались вам, знаю одно — мне невыносимо видеть ваши страдания. А сейчас... отдыхайте".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, скажите мне, если вдруг... если с вами вновь случится подобное. И я помогу, заглушу вашу боль! Хоть я и не до конца понимаю, как именно мои силы передались вам, знаю одно — мне невыносимо видеть ваши страдания. А сейчас... отдыхайте".

traits.locale_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “如果……如果再发生这样的情况，请你一定要立刻告诉我。我一定会竭尽所能减轻你的痛苦！虽然我不明白我的力量为什么会影响到你，但我无法眼睁睁地看你如此受苦。现在……你先好好休息吧。”
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."

traits.locale_text: “如果……如果再发生这样的情况，请你一定要立刻告诉我。我一定会竭尽所能减轻你的痛苦！虽然我不明白我的力量为什么会影响到你，但我无法眼睁睁地看你如此受苦。现在……你先好好休息吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bitte, wenn Euch ... so etwas je wieder geschieht, sagt es mir unverzüglich. Bitte. Ich werde Euch helfen, ich werde Eure Schmerzen lindern! Ich verstehe zwar nicht ganz, wie meine Kräfte auf Euch übergegangen sind, aber ich weiß, dass ich Euch nicht leiden sehen kann. Aber nun ... ruht Euch bitte aus."
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte, wenn Euch ... so etwas je wieder geschieht, sagt es mir unverzüglich. Bitte. Ich werde Euch helfen, ich werde Eure Schmerzen lindern! Ich verstehe zwar nicht ganz, wie meine Kräfte auf Euch übergegangen sind, aber ich weiß, dass ich Euch nicht leiden sehen kann. Aber nun ... ruht Euch bitte aus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous en prie, si... si une chose pareille devait à nouveau vous arriver, prévenez-moi tout de suite. Je vous aiderai, j'apaiserai votre douleur ! Même si je ne comprends pas vraiment comment mes pouvoirs s'étendent à vous, je sais qu'il m'est insupportable de vous voir souffrir. Maintenant, allez vous reposer. »
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en prie, si... si une chose pareille devait à nouveau vous arriver, prévenez-moi tout de suite. Je vous aiderai, j'apaiserai votre douleur ! Même si je ne comprends pas vraiment comment mes pouvoirs s'étendent à vous, je sais qu'il m'est insupportable de vous voir souffrir. Maintenant, allez vous reposer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Si... vuelve a pasarle algo así, dígamelo enseguida, por favor. ¡{mf|Le|La} ayudaré y aliviaré su dolor! Aunque no entiendo muy bien cómo se le contagiaron mis poderes, tengo claro que no soporto {mf|verle|verla} sufrir. Por ahora... descanse, por favor».
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."

traits.locale_text: «Si... vuelve a pasarle algo así, dígamelo enseguida, por favor. ¡{mf|Le|La} ayudaré y aliviaré su dolor! Aunque no entiendo muy bien cómo se le contagiaron mis poderes, tengo claro que no soporto {mf|verle|verla} sufrir. Por ahora... descanse, por favor».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「お願いです、もしも…このようなことが再び{name}様に起こったら、どうか、すぐあたくしに知らせてください。あたくしが{name}様を助け、痛みを和らげます！なぜあたくしの力が{name}様に広がるのか、十分に理解していないとしても、{name}様が苦しむ姿を見るのは耐えられません。今は…どうかお休みください」
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."

traits.locale_text: 「お願いです、もしも…このようなことが再び{name}様に起こったら、どうか、すぐあたくしに知らせてください。あたくしが{name}様を助け、痛みを和らげます！なぜあたくしの力が{name}様に広がるのか、十分に理解していないとしても、{name}様が苦しむ姿を見るのは耐えられません。今は…どうかお休みください」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lütfen... Eğer bir daha başına böyle bir şey gelirse hemen bana söyle. Elimden geleni yaparım, acını azaltırım! Güçlerimin sana nasıl geçtiğini hiç anlamıyorum ancak şunu biliyorum... Seni acı içinde görmeye dayanamıyorum. Hadi... Şimdi biraz dinlen."
languages.original_text: "Please, if... something like this ever happens to you again, please, tell me right away. I will help, I will ease your pain! Even though I don't quite understand how my powers spread to you, all I know is that I cannot bear to see you suffer. For now... please get some rest."
